narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Medical Transportation Management Inc. is a Transportation Broker provider based in Lake St Louis, MO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $38.4M in Medicaid payments across 3.7M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $38.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
